name: LD42 - Grid Blitz
description:
Clear all of the items to win! Grab items as they scroll by, and find a spot for them on the grid. Fill a grid with items, then click the button to clear those items. You get a limited number of grids, and a limited amount of time!

Can't fit your items in? Rotate them with the left and right arrow keys while dragging them (or hold them over the turntable at the top left corner)! Or pull other items off of the grid to make more room! Items you drop, or allow to scroll off the screen, will reappear again later.

The first number in a level's name rates how many items you'll see - a higher rating means more items! The second number is how fast the level is - a higher rating means items scroll by faster, and you get less time!

Every level can be solved perfectly... but can you figure out how to do it quickly enough? Good luck!
